faq.question: Does it work with all medical specialties?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI understands medical research across all specialties: cardiology, oncology, neurology, psychiatry, surgery, and more.

faq.question: Can it extract statistical significance?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The AI identifies p-values, confidence intervals, hazard ratios, and other statistical measures.

faq.question: What about systematic reviews and meta-analyses?
faq.answer: Yes! We support all types of medical literature including RCTs, observational studies, systematic reviews, and case reports.

faq.question: Is it HIPAA compliant?
faq.answer: Yes! We maintain HIPAA compliance for healthcare organizations. Enterprise plans include BAA agreements.

faq.question: Can I share summaries with colleagues?
faq.answer: Yes! Team plans support secure sharing within your healthcare organization.
